intro.title: Saying Goodbye to a Beloved Pet
intro.lead_text: Pets are family members too. We offer dignified cremation services and beautiful memorial products to honor their memory.

services.title: Individual Cremation
services.description: Your pet is cremated individually, and their ashes are returned to you in your chosen casket or urn.

services.title: Memorial Products
services.description: Beautiful urns, caskets, and memorial jewelry designed specifically for pets.

services.title: Memorial Gardens
services.description: Access to pet memorial gardens where you can visit and remember your beloved companion.

info_card.text: We understand the deep bond between pets and their families. Our caring team will treat your pet with the same dignity and respect we show to all those in our care.
